text: As a kind of "tradition", the most watched Brazilian TV program annually is 9PM telenovela of Rede Globo. For the 2015-16 season, will be released two novelas for this time, with a minimum target of 35 points. The first, Babilônia (English title: Babylon) is written by Gilberto Braga, Ricardo Linhares and João Ximenes Braga, and has been broadcasting since Monday, March 16, 2015, at 9:30 p.m. / 10:45 p.m. (BRT/AMT). ==Table== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- ! WEEK !! MON !! TUE !! WED !! THU !! FRI !! SAT !! WEEK AVERAGE !! MONTH AVERAGE |- | 16/03/2015 to 21/03/2015 || 33 || 30 || 29 || 29 || 26 || 23 || 28.3 points || rowspan="3" | MARCH 25.5 POINTS |- | 23/03/2015 to 28/03/2015 || 29 || 26 || 25 || 25 || 25 || 22 || 25.3 points |- | 30/03/2015 to 04/04/2015 || 24 || 25 || 23 || 23 || 23 || 20 || 23.0 points |- | 06/04/2015 to 11/04/2015 || 26 || 26 || 25 || 25 || 24 || 21 || 24.5 points || rowspan="4" | APRIL 25.3 POINTS |- | 13/04/2015 to 18/04/2015 || 25 || 24 || 23 || 24 || 24 || 22 || 23.6 points |- | 20/04/2015 to 25/04/2015 || 24 || 28 || 26 || 27 || 25 || 24 || 25.6 points |- | 27/04/2015 to 02/05/2015 || 28 || 29 || 29 || 27 || 26 || 26 || 27.5 points |- | 04/05/2015 to 09/05/2015 || 29 || 27 || 25 || 27 || 25 || 23 || 26.0 points || rowspan="4" | MAY ** POINTS |- | 11/05/2015 to 16/05/2015 || 27 || 27 || 25 || 25 || 24 || 24 || 25.3 points |- | 18/05/2015 to 23/05/2015 || 28 || 29 || 24 || 27 || 25 || 23 || 26.0 points |- | 25/05/2015 to 30/05/2015 || 28 || 24 || 24 || 25 || 23 || 23 || 24.5 points |- | 01/06/2015 to 06/06/2015 || 28 || 26 || 23 || 23 || 23 || 21 || 24.0 points || rowspan="4" | JUNE ** POINTS |- | 08/06/2015 to 13/06/2015 || 23 || 27 || 24 || 25 || 23 || 21 || 23.8 points |- | 15/06/2015 to 20/06/2015 || 26 || 23 || 22 || 27 || 24 || 19 || 23.5 points |- | 22/06/2015 to 27/06/2015 || 25 || 26 || 25 || 25 || 23 || 21 || 24.1 points |- |} ==Audience== ===March=== DebutIn his debut, Babilônia has acquired an Ibope Rating of 31 points in the preliminary numbers, representing the worst debut of a 9PM telenovela in all time."Babilônia" estreia com 31 pontos de audiência. However, in the final numbers, this index increased two points, and the debut recorded 33 points, with 50% share.Veja magazine - O Ibope de "Babilônia"RD1 - “Babilônia” supera “Império”, mas empata com “Em Família” na estreia At the same time, Carrossel (SBT - 8 points) and Vitória (Record - 6 points), had a good performance. This represents that 6.534 million viewers watched this chapter in Greater São Paulo."Babilônia" estreia com ritmo alucinante, armações e morte Compared to the two predecessors, the debut index surpassed Império (32 points) and tied with Em Família (33 points).'Em Família' tem a pior estreia de novela das nove da história In Rio, the debut recorded 35 points of average, surpassing its two predecessors Império and Em Família (both with 34 points).'Babilônia' estreia com 35 pontos no Rio e 33 em São Paulo This represents that 4,884 million people watched. In Salvador, the audience was 40 points, one of the highest ratings of debut nationwide.Babilônia tem ibope recorde, mas só na Bahia First weekIn the second chapter, recorded 29.8 (30) points, down 9%.Segundo capítulo de Babilônia cai 9% e fica abaixo de 30 pontos Fell short of its predecessor, Império (35 points), but overcame Em Família (29 points). Em Família despenca no segundo capítulo e fica abaixo de 30 pontos In the third and fourth chapter, the ratings continued to fall, registering 29 points.Estadão - Sob ameaça de boicote, audiência de ‘Babilônia’ volta a cairYahoo! Celebridades - Audiência da novela “Babilônia” despenca In the same period, SBT, with a rerun of Carrossel, had a great performance, registering 12.5 and 12.6 respectively.Na Telinha - Reprise de "Carrossel" eleva audiência do SBT em até 225% na faixaReprise da novela 'Carrossel' alcança picos de 15 pontos e segue trajetória de alta; veja consolidados de quarta On Friday and Saturday, the audience remained low, recording 26 and 23 points respectively. At the end of the first week, Babilônia lost a third of its public.O Dia - Audiência da novela ‘Babilônia’ cai na primeira semana {| class="toccolours" style="float:right; margin-right:1em; margin-right:2em; font-size:75%; background:#def; color:black; width:20em; max-width:20%;" cellspacing="0" |- | colspan=4 |Greater São Paulo most watched programs on March 25, 2015 |- ! Pos. ! Program ! Ibope Rating |- | 1 | Big Brother Brasil 15 | 27.8 |- | 2 | Alto Astral | 25.3 |- | 3 | Babilônia | 24.9 |- | 4 | Jornal Nacional | 24.9 |- | 5 | Wednesday Football Night | 22.9 |- | 6 | SPTV (2nd Edition) | 22.6 |- | 7 | Sete Vidas | 19.4 |- | 8 | O Rei do Gado (repeat) | 19.4 |} Second weekIn the second week, the audience continued to fall in São Paulo. On March 23, in the preliminary numbers, Babilônia recorded 23.3 points, one of the worst audiences of all time. Before, the Jornal Nacional recorded 20 points. But the next day, the Ibope reported that there was an error in the measurement in real time and adjusted the numbers of the attractions displayed after 6PM (access prime).Falha no Ibope tira 5 pontos do Jornal Nacional e de BabilôniaIbope comete "erro técnico" e aumenta em 5 pontos audiência do Jornal NacionalCom erro do Ibope, "JN" e "Babilônia" disparam no consolidado; entenda There was an increase of 6 points between the preliminary and final numbers: 29 points.Principais audiências da TV (Segunda 23/3/15) In Rio, the performance was better: 35 points.Rio de Janeiro: confira os consolidados desta segunda- feira, 23/03/2015 On Tuesday (24), fell by 3 points, and recorded 26. On Wednesday (25), soccer day on television, where the duration of the telenovela is shorter, Babilônia recorded 24.9 points in the preliminary numbers, against 25.2 of Alto Astral (7PM telenovela) and 27.8 of Big Brother Brasil 15, being one of the rare times in the Brazilian television history that 9PM telenovela is not the most watched program of the day."Babilônia" assusta Globo: trama dá menos audiência que novela das 19hBig Brother e novela das sete superam audiência de Babilônia"Babilônia" segue em queda e dá menos audiência que "Alto Astral" Throughout the week, the numbers remained stable. ===April=== Third weekOn Monday (3/30), recorded 24 points, an historically low rating for the time slot. ==References== Category:Babilônia (TV series)
title: Audience of Babilônia
